text: Saúl Ordóñez Gavela (born 10 April 1994) is a Spanish middle-distance runner specialising in the 800 metres. He won a bronze medal at the 2018 World Indoor Championships. Earlier he won a silver at the 2015 European U23 Championships. He holds the Spanish national record in the distance with 1:43.65. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2013 |European Junior Championships |Rieti, Italy |24th (h) |1500 m |3:56.14 |- |2015 |European U23 Championships |Tallinn, Estonia |bgcolor=silver|2nd |800 m |1:48.23 |- |rowspan=2|2016 |rowspan=2|Mediterranean U23 Championships |rowspan=2|Tunis, Tunisia |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |800 m |1:48.12 |- |bgcolor=silver|2nd |4 × 400 m relay |3:13.73 |- |rowspan=3|2018 |World Indoor Championships |Birmingham, United Kingdom |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |800 m |1:48.01 |- |European Championships |Berlin, Germany |10th (sf) |800 m |1:46.82 |- |European Cross Country Championships |Tilburg, Netherlands |bgcolor=gold |1st |4 x 1,5 km mixed relay |16:10 |- |2019 |European Indoor Championships |Glasgow, United Kingdom | - |1500 m |DNF |} ==Personal bests== Outdoor *400 metres – 48.74 (Palencia 2015) *800 metres – 1:43.65 NR (Monaco 2018) *1500 metres – 3:40.39 (Huelva 2017) *3000 metres – 8:30.48 (Valladolid 2013) Indoor *800 metres – 1:46.96 (Karlsruhe 2018) *1500 metres – 3:44.64 (Dortmund 2018) *3000 metres – 8:07.37 (Antequera 2015) ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male middle-distance runners Category:People from Ponferrada
title: Saúl Ordóñez
